# Lojban

### What is Lojban?

Lojban is a constructed language (or conlang) that was developed in the 1970s by James Cooke Brown. It is based on a set of logical rules that make it possible to create an infinite number of sentences in the language. Lojban is designed to be a universal language, meaning that it can be used to communicate with people from any language background.
